summary: This folder serves as the primary entry point and orchestration layer for the VastCtl CLI. It defines the command-line structure using Click and manages the lifecycle of the CliContext, which bridges the presentation layer with the underlying business logic in vastctl-core.
responsibilities: Defining the CLI command hierarchy and sub-command registration.
Managing global CLI state and shared resources via CliContext.
Initializing core components like Registry, ConnectionManager, and StorageManager.
Handling automated cloud synchronization and event reporting hooks.
Providing a unified entry point for the vastctl executable.
